channel.title: RSPS [PI] 317 prices help
channel.description:
EX: http://prntscr.com/6y0ihr EX: http://prntscr.com/6y0ibe
I set the santa hat to 1b and it shows it as being higher, but it lets me buy it for 1b. Any help would be appreciated, thanks!

item.title: RSPS [PI] 317 prices help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

For future reference, it helps if you give us code we’re able to edit. So posting it in code tags is very appreciated.

(This would be why):

Your issue, luckily, is very very easy to solve. If you look 3 lines down in the picture (see here, I’d just point out the line in the code) you’ll see “ShopValue *= 1.15;”.
Delete it.

All that code does is take the shopvalue (previously determined on the second line in the picture) and multiplies it by 1.15.
1,000,000,000 * 1.15 = 1,150,000,000

Read full topic
